title: How to Make Salty Lemonade

steps.headline: Get a clean workspace.
steps.description: This is vital, because most of the ingredients are too hard to pick up once they have been spilled.

steps.headline: Chop a lemon in two.

text: Get a clean workspace. This is vital, because most of the ingredients are too hard to pick up once they have been spilled. Chop a lemon in two. This recipe calls for only half a lemon, so it's a good idea to save the other part for another glass. Squeeze the lemon into a bowl. Add the salt to the lemon.  Mix it up and filter it. Note that this mixture shouldn't contain any fibres or seeds. Pour it into a glass.  Add some club soda and water.  Top it off with some ice and mint leaves.  Add a straw and a mini-beach umbrella! (optional) Finished.
